trans-unit.id: and select connect to scan the QR-Code
trans-unit.source: and select 'Connect' to scan the QR Code.

trans-unit.note: [ControlCenter -> Trackers] Detected and Blocked trackers count

trans-unit.id: **This feature is EXPERIMENTAL, as such, it may not work as expected in some instances. \n\n**Mobile Safari has performance issues with the PAC config, so it is recommended you use Cliqz, Ghostery or another Browser instead.
trans-unit.source: **This feature is EXPERIMENTAL, as such, it may not work as expected in some instances. \n\n**Mobile Safari has performance issues with the PAC config, so it is recommended you use Cliqz, Ghostery or another Browser instead.
trans-unit.target: **Diese Funktion ist in der VERSUCHSPHASE und funktioniert daher in einigen Fällen u. U. nicht erwartungsgemäß. \n\n**Bei Mobile Safari kommt es zu Leistungsproblemen mit der PAC-Konfiguration. Es wird daher empfohlen, statt dessen Cliqz, Ghostery oder einen anderen Browser zu benutzen.

trans-unit.target: Ein \"fairer\" Modus, der Werbung nur in klar definierten Fällen zulässt, wird bald hinzugefügt.

Back to safe site buttun title in antiphishing alert title

trans-unit.id: Browse cleaner, faster, and safer on-the-go with Ghostery, now optimized for mobile!
trans-unit.source: Browse cleaner, faster, and safer on-the-go with Ghostery, now optimized for mobile!
trans-unit.target: Surfe auch unterwegs sauberer, schneller und sicherer mit Ghostery! Jetzt für Mobilgeräte optimiert!

trans-unit.id: Browse cleaner, faster, and safer on-the-go with Ghostery, now optimized for mobile! Don't worry, all your data will be imported.
trans-unit.source: Browse cleaner, faster, and safer on-the-go with Ghostery, now optimized for mobile! Don't worry, all your data will be imported.
trans-unit.target: Surfe auch unterwegs sauberer, schneller und sicherer mit Ghostery! Jetzt für Mobilgeräte optimiert! Keine Sorge, alle deine Daten werden übernommen.

trans-unit.id: Browse faster, safer and efficiently with Ad & Tracker Blocking. You can customize your settings in the Ghostery Control Center.
trans-unit.source: Browse faster, safer and efficiently with Ad & Tracker Blocking. You can customize your settings in the Ghostery Control Center.
trans-unit.target: Schnelleres, sichereres und effizienteres Browsen mit Werbe- & Tracker-Blockierung. Du kannst deine Einstellungen im Ghostery Control Center anpassen.

trans-unit.id: But stay tuned to receive attractive discounts and bargains in the future
trans-unit.source: But stay tuned to receive attractive discounts and bargains in the future
trans-unit.target: Wir halten dich über künftige attraktive Angebote und Rabatte auf dem Laufenden

trans-unit.id: But we'll keep looking for you and add them here as soon as we have one
trans-unit.source: But we'll keep looking for you and add them here as soon as we have one
trans-unit.target: Wir halten weiter Ausschau für dich und fügen sie hinzu sobald wir welche haben.
trans-unit.note: [MyOffrz] No offers text label for DE

trans-unit.id: CLIQZ has blocked access to %1$ because it has been reported as a phishing website.Phishing websites disguise as other sites you may trust in order to trick you into disclosing your login, password or other sensitive information
trans-unit.source: Ghostery has blocked access to %1$ because it has been reported as a phishing website.\nPhishing websites disguise as other sites you may trust in order to trick you into disclosing your login, password or other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: Ghostery hat den Zugang zu %1$ gesperrt, weil sie als Phishing-Website gemeldet wurde.\nPhishing-Websites geben sich als andere, vertrauenswürdige Websites aus, um dich zu verleiten, Anmeldedaten, Passwörter oder andere wichtige Informationen preiszugeben.

trans-unit.note: [ControlCenter - Trackers list] Cancel action title Cancel Cancel button in the 'Show blocked top-sites' alert Cancel button title in the urlbar

trans-unit.id: Changes applied. Refresh page to see them.
trans-unit.source: Changes applied. Refresh page to see them.
trans-unit.target: Änderungen gespeichert. Seite zum Anzeigen neu laden.

trans-unit.id: Choose what you want Ghostery to block for cleaner, faster, and safer browsing. You can change and customize these settings at any time in the Privacy Control Center.
trans-unit.source: Choose what you want Ghostery to block for cleaner, faster, and safer browsing. You can change and customize these settings at any time in the Privacy Control Center.
trans-unit.target: Wähle aus, was Ghostery blockieren soll, damit du schneller, sicherer und sauberer surfst. Du kannst diese Einstellung jederzeit im Ghostery Control Center anpassen und ändern.

trans-unit.id: Cliqz Browser does not have access to your camera. To enable access, tap ‘Settings’ and turn on camera.
trans-unit.source: Ghostery Browser does not have access to your camera. To enable access, tap ‘Settings’ and turn on camera.
trans-unit.target: Der Ghostery-Browser hat keinen Zugriff auf Ihre Kamera. Zur Aktivierung des Zugriffs „Settings“ antippen und die Kamera einschalten.
trans-unit.note: [Connect] Alert message for turning on Camera access when Scanning QR Code

trans-unit.id: Cliqz Browser has to download some data packages first, before the ad-blocker works efficiently. For this, the app must be connected to Wi-Fi.
trans-unit.source: Ghostery Browser has to download some data packages first, before the ad-blocker works efficiently. For this, the app must be connected to Wi-Fi.
trans-unit.target: Der Ghostery-Browser muss zuerst einige Datenpakete herunterladen, bevor der Werbeblocker effizient funktionieren kann. Dafür muss die App eine WiFi-Verbindung haben.

trans-unit.id: Cliqz works with anonymized data of search queries and website visits that have been generated by our community of users. The technology that collects this data to build the web index is called Human Web.
trans-unit.source: Ghostery works with anonymized data of search queries and website visits that have been generated by our community of users. The technology that collects this data to build the web index is called Human Web.
trans-unit.target: Ghostery läuft mit anonymisierten Daten von Suchanfragen und Website-Besuchen, die von unserer Nutzergemeinschaft erzeugt wurden. Die Technologie, die diese Daten zum Aufbau des Web-Index sammelt, wird als Human Web bezeichnet.
trans-unit.note: [Settings -> Human Web]Footer text for Fair Blocking section
Title for complementary search engine picker.

trans-unit.id: Connect Cliqz on your computer with Cliqz on your iOS device. This will allow you to send tabs from your desktop to your mobile device. You can also directly download videos from your desktop browser to your mobile device.
trans-unit.source: Connect Cliqz on your computer with Cliqz on your iOS device. This will allow you to send tabs from your desktop to your mobile device. You can also directly download videos from your desktop browser to your mobile device.
trans-unit.target: Verbinde Cliqz auf deinem Computer mit Cliqz auf deinem iOS-Gerät. Dann kannst du Tabs von deinem Computer auf dein verbundenes Gerät schicken. Du kannst auch Videos vom Browser direkt auf dein Mobilgerät herunterladen.

trans-unit.id: Ghostery for iOS now lets you protect your WiFi connection. It can block trackers in OTHER applications as long as you are connected to this WiFi network. It must be set up each time for each different network (home, work, school, etc).
trans-unit.source: Ghostery for iOS now lets you protect your WiFi connection. It can block trackers in OTHER applications as long as you are connected to this WiFi network. It must be set up each time for each different network (home, work, school, etc).
trans-unit.target: Mit Ghostery für iOS kannst Du jetzt deine WiFi-Verbindung schützen. Es kann Tracker in ANDEREN Anwendungen sperren, solange du mit diesem WiFi-Netzwerk verbunden bist. Es muss jedes Mal für jedes einzelne Netzwerk (Zuhause, Arbeit, Schule usw.) eingerichtet werden.

trans-unit.id: Ghostery would like to access your Photos
trans-unit.source: Ghostery would like to access your Photos
trans-unit.target: Ghostery möchte auf deine Fotos zugreifen

trans-unit.id: Have fun with your free two-week trial and take your time to explore all Lumen features!

trans-unit.target: Wir wünschen dir viel Spaß mit deiner kostenlosen Testversion! Ab jetzt kannst du alle Lumen-Funktionen 14 Tage lang uneingeschränkt ausprobieren!

trans-unit.id: Help us improve your browsing experience. Ghostery collects strictly anonymous usage data. At no occasion is any personal data collected.
trans-unit.source: Help us improve your browsing experience. Ghostery collects strictly anonymous usage data. At no occasion is any personal data collected.
trans-unit.target: Hilf uns, dein Browsing-Erlebnis zu verbessern. Ghostery sammelt ausschließlich anonyme Nutzungsdaten. In keinem Fall werden persönliche Daten gesammelt.

trans-unit.id: Here you'll find a new offer every week

trans-unit.target: Für einfacheres, schnelleres und sichereres Browsen. Keine Sorge, alle deine Daten werden importiert. Mit der Nutzung stimmst du Ghosterys Datenschutzrichtlinie zu

trans-unit.id: We use opensource software Sentry (http://sentry.io) for our crash reports. These reports do not contain any personal data.
trans-unit.source: We use opensource software Sentry (http://sentry.io) for our crash reports. These reports do not contain any personal data.
trans-unit.target: Wir benutzen die Open-Source-Software Sentry (http://sentry.io) für unsere Absturzberichte. Diese Berichte enthalten keine personenbezogenen Daten.

trans-unit.id: Websites which are known to contain explicit content are automatically opened in Forget Tabs. Visits to such websites are therefore not saved to your history.
trans-unit.source: Websites which are known to contain explicit content are automatically opened in Ghost Tabs. Visits to such websites are therefore not saved to your history.
trans-unit.target: Websites, von denen bekannt ist, dass sie anstößige Inhalte enthalten, werden automatisch in Ghost Tabs geöffnet. Besuche solcher Websites werden daher in Ihrem Browserverlauf nicht gespeichert.

trans-unit.source: Tap 'connect' to browse the Internet with VPN protection.
trans-unit.target: Tippe auf ‚Verbinden‘ translate in UI um mit VPN-Schutz im Internet zu surfen.

trans-unit.id: Websites which are known to contain explicit content are automatically opened in Private Tabs. Visits to such websites are therefore not saved to your history.
trans-unit.source: Websites which are known to contain explicit content are automatically opened in Private Tabs. Visits to such websites are therefore not saved to your history.
trans-unit.target: Websites, von denen bekannt ist, dass sie anstößige Inhalte enthalten, werden automatisch in Private Tabs geöffnet. Besuche solcher Websites werden daher in Ihrem Browserverlauf nicht gespeichert.

trans-unit.note: Will be displayed in Settings under 'Close Private Tabs'

trans-unit.id: You are browsing in Private Mode: Websites you visit in the mode will not be saved in your history, and local data, including cookies, will not be stored.
trans-unit.source: You are browsing in Private Mode: Websites you visit in the mode will not be saved in your history, and local data, including cookies, will not be stored.
trans-unit.note: Description text displayed when there are no open tabs while in private mode
trans-unit.target: Du surfst im Private Modus: Websites, die du in diesem Modus besuchst, werden nicht in deinem Browserverlauf gespeichert, und lokale Daten einschließlich Cookies werden nicht gespeichert.

trans-unit.note: Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to create a favorite for the current website.
Action label on share extension to immediately open page in Ghostery.
Action label on share extension to search for the selected text in Ghostery.
